summary: This document is a forwarded email containing staff assignments for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for August 10, 2019. It lists correctional officers and their shifts, including those assigned to the Special Housing Unit. The document is significant as it provides a snapshot of staffing on the night Jeffrey Epstein died in custody.

persons.name: Tova Noel
persons.context: Listed as the Special Housing Unit#1 Officer working the morning shift (12:00 AM-8:00 AM) on August 10, 2019.

persons.name: Michael Thomas
persons.context: Listed as the Special Housing Unit#2 Officer working the morning shift (12:00 AM-8:00 AM) on August 10, 2019.

events.title: MCC Staff Assignments
events.description: Staffing assignments for the Metropolitan Correctional Center, including officers for the Special Housing Units.

locations: 1 Battery Park Plaza, 29th floor, New York, NY 10004 (Office of the Inspector General)
keyFacts: The document records staff assignments for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) on August 10, 2019.
Tova Noel and Michael Thomas are listed as officers assigned to the Special Housing Unit morning shift (12 AM - 8 AM) on that date.
The document is a forwarded email from a Special Agent in the Office of the Inspector General, dated August 11, 2019.
The staffing record is relevant to the investigation into the circumstances surrounding Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
